issue.title: [Java] Make ListVector and MapVector create reader lazily
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5911](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5911). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current implementation creates reader eagerly, which may cause unnecessary resource and time. This issue changes the behavior to lazily create the reader.

This is a follow-up issue for ARROW-5897.
